price: Diles [¡oh, Mujámmad!]: "Lo ha revelado Quien conoce lo oculto en los cielos y en la Tierra; Él es Absolvedor, Misericordioso".
arabic: قُلۡ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul anzalahu alladhī yaʿlamu al-sira fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu kāna ghafūran raḥīman
